snippet: Despite a promising report this week from the International Energy Agency, the nation would still need to be concerned with foreign markets because oil prices are set globally.
abstract: News analysis; United States still needs to be concerned with foreign energy markets despite a promising report from International Energy Agency that the nation is poised to become the world's largest oil producer thanks to new drilling technologies in shale fields across the country.
lead_paragraph: Despite a promising report this week from the International Energy Agency, the nation would still need to be concerned with foreign markets because oil prices are set globally.

headline.seo: Energy Independence in America? Don’t Pop the Cork Yet
headline.main: Energy Independence in the United States? Don’t Pop the Cork Yet
headline.print_headline: Energy Independence in the United States? Don’t Pop the Cork Yet
